summary: Paralysis of the Inferno takes your favorite spell effects and crams them into one spell. Like, Fire damage, Paralysis, and Unrelenting Force. This spell is a fairly balanced spell that is sure to make your enemies bow down to you.
descriptionHtml:
This spell does 25 points of burn damage to get your enemies crispy like bacon out of the pan in the morning. Next, your victims are frozen in place, unable to move for 2 seconds while you get your bearings. Finally, you have a little bit of the Dovahkiin in your new spell, you will knock your opponent back while they are paralyzed and on fire.

You can find the vendor that sells this Spell Tome at the Drunken Huntsman behind the main counter. His name is Bernard.

Install Instructions: 
NMM: Download and install regularly with NMM
Manual: Download file, unzip, place .esp file in Data file
author: AcidRainBurns
